explanation: [0-0] On a sunny beach, a young woman in a pink and white bikini lies leisurely on a blue beach towel, enjoying a relaxing time. Next to her is a glass of wine, and in the distance, the blue sea meets the blue sky, dotted with white clouds. There are several coconut trees planted on the beach, with blue-brown parasols. Some tourists are on the beach, and a vendor in red clothes and a sun hat stands in front of a gray food truck.

[0-3] Suddenly, the tourists on the beach run forward in panic, and the woman turns her head in surprise to see what's behind her. A stiff zombie in a gray top and army green pants appears on the left side of the screen. He reaches out his arm and stumbles to his knees on the woman's beach towel. The woman gets up and runs away in fear. Behind this zombie, a large group of zombies reach out and approach the woman.

[0-3] Suddenly, the tourists on the beach run forward in panic, and the woman turns her head in surprise to see what's behind her. A stiff zombie in a gray top and army green pants appears on the left side of the screen. He reaches out his arm and stumbles to his knees on the woman's beach towel. The woman gets up and runs away in fear. Behind this zombie, a large group of zombies reach out and approach the woman.

[0-3] Suddenly, the tourists on the beach run forward in panic, and the woman turns her head in surprise to see what's behind her. A stiff zombie in a gray top and army green pants appears on the left side of the screen. He reaches out his arm and stumbles to his knees on the woman's beach towel. The woman gets up and runs away in fear. Behind this zombie, a large group of zombies reach out and approach the woman.

[3-7] The screen is then split into two parts, with the woman still running on the beach in the upper center, and a black background below. The woman runs to a dirt wall, still in shock. At this moment, a white hand appears in the picture and clicks on the icon of a shovel on the screen. The picture switches to the other side of the dirt wall, where three tourists, a woman and two men, are desperately dodging the zombies and standing in front of the dirt wall. The woman with the shovel runs over to them, and a white hand appears again, clicking on the screen. Two rows of shovel icons appear on the dirt wall, suggesting the need to dig an escape route.

[7-14] The shovel icons disappear, and the woman starts to chisel a hole in the dirt wall with the shovel. The three tourists follow her into the cave. As the woman chisels the hole in the dirt wall, some sandbags fall down. The white hand appears in the picture again and clicks on the screen, moving the sandbags under the wall deep in the cave to the entrance of the cave to resist the invasion of zombies. The woman and the three tourists turn around and look at the sandbags in front of them. The white hand clicks on the screen, and a green room appears inside the cave. The green room disappears and becomes transparent, and the woman turns around to look at the tourists behind her. The white hand clicked on the icon of a gun above the room, and the icon was surrounded by a green circle and then disappeared. A golden circle appears at the feet of the woman and the tourists, and they all hold a gun in their hands.

[14-24] Together they turn around with their weapons ready to meet the battle. Zombies frantically hit the sandbags, trying to break through the line of defense and enter the cave. The woman and three other tourists open fire, sparks fly, and kill the approaching zombies one by one. The picture switches to the black underground of the dirt wall, showing a five-story shelter. The shelter is well-equipped with restaurants, billiard rooms, bedrooms, farms, etc., and people live a safe and comfortable life inside.
